{{ardayearheader|2861|2862|2863|2864|2865|2866|2868}}

* [[King of Rohan]] [[Folca]] finds and destroys the last orc-hold, ending the orc-raids that troubled [[Rohan]] for 64 years.<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref><ref name="Mark"/>
* Birth of [[Kíli]], younger son of [[Dís]], nephew and companion of [[Thorin|Thorin II Oakenshield]].<ref>{{App|Durin}}</ref>
* Death of King [[Folca]] after chasing the [[Boar of Everholt]].<ref name="Mark">{{App|Mark}}</ref>
* [[Folcwine]], son of Folca, becomes the fourteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark"/>
* Birth of [[Bingo Baggins]], fifth child and third son of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]].<ref name="Baggins">{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Fosco Baggins]], son of [[Largo Baggins]] and [[Tanta Hornblower]].<ref name="Baggins"/>
* Birth of [[Ruby Bolger]], third child and daughter of [[Adalgar Bolger]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|2, Third Age 2864]]
